ovdesc.p: EB.CONTEXT is the T24 Application to define CONTEXT records which will serve as data pool for defining RULES through the RULES DESINGER front-end tool. This will hold T24 applications from where the actual data are fetched to form a rule. This Application can hold two types of records, one is SYSTEM record which contains common variables that can be used across rules and the other is CONTEXT specific records that can be used for specific rules.
